summary: This is an email notification from the State Attorney's Office regarding a new document available for download in case number 2020PR000426AMB, which involves defendant Jeffrey E. Epstein. The email is addressed to an attorney and copied to a paralegal on the case.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Named as the defendant in case number 2020PR000426AMB, for which a new document has become available.

events.title: New Document Available Notification
events.description: The State Attorney's Office sends an email notification that a new file is available for download in the case against Jeffrey E. Epstein.

keyFacts: A new document became available in case number 2020PR000426AMB on September 14, 2020.
Jeffrey E. Epstein is listed as the defendant in the case.
The notification was sent via email from the State Attorney's Office to legal personnel involved in the case.
